channel.title: Internet on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on 2D Steve

item.title: Potty Mouth
item.description: The rise of the Twitch superstar has been an interesting one.

item.title: That Felt Good
item.description: Tonight was the epic return of Horseshoes & Hand Grenades. We rode into the internet on tigers and showed the world what real fun felt like.

item.title: Of Star Wars and Skyrim
item.description: I just realized that I have yet to write a blog post about what may very well be the most culturally significant announcement of this year.

item.title: High Fiber
item.description: I was sitting around editing together another little masterpiece to herald H&H’s triumphant return, then I remembered, it’s blog time!

item.title: H&H Returns
item.description: I was going to follow up yesterday with a part 2, but I’ve decided that it will be neither good for me, or anyone else.

item.title: Reading With My Ears
item.description: I don’t know about you guys, but in this culture where we have less and less time to do anything, one of the things I miss the most is having time to sit down and read a book.

item.title: Synergized!
item.description: I’m just going to come right out and say it:

item.title: Internet Junk
item.description: I’ve pretty much spent this entire day poking around on the internet trying to get into whatever it is one can get into on the internet.

item.title: Sony POS
item.description: I saw this on Diggnation and thought that you guys should see it too.

item.title: Reconstruction
item.description: I am busy at work on revamping the Horseshoes & Hand Grenades web site and I need a break!

item.title: H&H - The BLoG!
item.description: Horseshoes & Hand Grenades has officially added a blog to our already news filled podcast.

item.title: Obsessive
item.description: Brace yourselves, ye faithful visitors. I have a crapload of things to say because I’m in one of those rare moods to write.

item.title: Post Secret
item.description: I remember a few years ago when I stumbled upon this site and thought to myself, “What an awesome idea!
